Description:
Model
Brand: Cooler Master
Name: SK622
Model: SK-622-SKTL1-US


Keyboard
Keyboard Interface: USB Type-C (Keyboard Side), USB 2.0 Type A (Computer Side)
Design Style: TKL
Palm Rest: No
Mechanical Keyboard: Yes
Key Switch Type: Blue Switch
Keyboard Color: White
Backlit: RGB
Dimensions: Standard: 1.19" x 11.54" x 4.06" 
Feet Open: 1.69" x 11.54" x 4.06"
Type: Wired / Bluetooth 4.0


Mouse
Mouse Included: No


Wireless
Power Supply: 4000 mAh (2 x 2000 mAh)


OS / System Requirement
Operating System Supported: Mac OS X 10.10+ / iOS 5+ / Android 3.2+ / Windows 8 and above


Features
Features: The SK622 hybrid wireless gaming keyboard takes a modern approach to the classic mechanical keyboard with low profile switches housed in a sleek chassis for a drool-worthy aesthetic. The 60% keyboard layout is outfitted with low profile mechanical RGB switches with upgraded ergonomic keycaps from the previous version for a typing experience that feels as good as the keyboard looks. Add in hybrid connectivity that lets you choose between wired or Bluetooth wireless use on both Mac and Windows devices, and you have the ultimate on-the-go keyboard for both work and play.
Label: Teclado Cooler Master SK622 RGB White
